Articles.Content:
I have been modeling new parts, but their ability to stay attached when the sim begins remains unpredictable. Sometimes one part of three symetrically attached will break off. Sometimes everything falls off. The reason given is structural failure.

I have been experimenting with crash tolerance, breaking force and torque. Maybe something is wrong with the attach points or node collider. Maybe there is a way to make an "unbreakable" part for testing?

Suggestions?

Some of my parts can be downloaded here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/23774-Pre-Alpha-Airship-to-Orbit-Parts-and-Plugin-Alpha-Release-with-Video?p=295862#post295862

Edited October 15, 2012 by Hooligan Labs
